thread.title: PlayStation VR Will Empower Developers, Says Sony
thread.title_full: PlayStation VR Will Empower Developers, Says Sony - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: PlayStation VR Will Empower Developers, Says Sony
text: PlayStation VR, formerly known as Project Morpheus, does not currently have an official launch date or a list of titles that will be offered alongside it, but Sony says that the tech will be a very important tool for developers because it gives them new ways to deliver interesting ideas and mechanics to the player base. Shuhei Yoshida, who leads the Worldwide Studios, is Quote: d by Â»
